syncData.content:
{"settings":"{
    "python.pythonPath": "~/Documents/venv/bin/python",
    "python.analysis.typeCheckingMode": "basic",
    "editor.formatOnSave": true,
    "editor.tabSize": 4,
    "files.exclude": {
        "**/__pycache__": true,
        "**/.pytest_cache": true,
        "**/*.pyc": true,
        "**/*.pyo": true,
        "**/*.pyd": true,
        "**/.git": true,
        "**/.vscode": true,
        "**/.venv": true
    },
    "python.analysis.diagnosticSeverityOverrides": {
        "reportMissingImports": "warning",
        "reportUnusedImport": "information"
    },
    "editor.codeActionsOnSave": {
        "source.fixAll": "explicit"
    },
    "python.analysis.autoSearchPaths": true,
    "python.analysis.useLibraryCodeForTypes": true,
    "python.formatting.provider": "black",
    "python.formatting.blackArgs": [
        "--line-length",
        "88"
    ],
    "python.linting.enabled": true,
    "python.linting.lintOnSave": true,
    "[python]": {
        "editor.formatOnSave": true,
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "ms-python.python"
    },
    "python.linting.flake8Enabled": true,
    "python.linting.mypyEnabled": true,
    "python.linting.pylintEnabled": true,
    "python.linting.mypyArgs": [
        "--ignore-missing-imports"
    ],
    "python.linting.flake8Args": [
        "--max-line-length=88"
    ],
    "workbench.iconTheme": "vscode-icons",
    "editor.formatOnPaste": true,
    "jupyter.askForKernelRestart": false,
    "jupyter.notebookFileRoot": "${workspaceFolder}",
    "jupyter.jupyterServerType": "local",
    "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.linux": "zsh",
    "git.autofetch": true,
    "git.confirmSync": false,
    "git.enableSmartCommit": true,
    "python.testing.pytestEnabled": true,
    "python.testing.unittestEnabled": false,
    "python.testing.nosetestsEnabled": false,
    "codeium.autoComplete": true,
    "codeium.suggestion": true,
    "codeium.enableForPython": true,
    "codeium.enableForJupyter": true,
    "codeium.enableForJavascript": true,
    "codeium.enableForTypescript": true,
    "eslint.enable": true,
    "prettier.requireConfig": true,
    "prettier.singleQuote": true,
    "prettier.trailingComma": "es5",
    "prettier.arrowParens": "always",
    "vsicons.dontShowNewVersionMessage": true
}"}
